drupalNodeEvent.title: International conference "Global China in a Religious World", Online Session III (Oct 27-28)

field_organizers.processed: Hong Kong Institute for the Humanities and Social Sciences, The University of Hong Kong

field_description.processed:
The ASIAR research cluster at HKIHSS is delighted to invite you to attend our upcoming International conference on "Global China in a Religious World", online Session III, co-organized by Center for Global Asia, NYU Shanghai.

The conference will take place on October 27-28, 2023, you are welcome to join us via Zoom.

For any further inquiries, please contact the ASIAR Research Cluster (asiar@hku.hk).
